name: Toppy's Mansion
description:
Come with me and let's play some tricks ! 

You are an old prankster spirit that has taken up residence in a gorgeous manor 
by chasing its inhabitants away ! You have been sleeping for 20 years when suddenly,
a mysterious girl  enters the house and wakes you up...

Why is she here ? What is she looking for ? Let's find out... 

You'll need to use your trickster abilities to scare her (only a little),
guide her path and push her to talk to you.

The Context :

This is a game developed by a team of 8 students for our last project of our 2nd year Bachelor.
We had one month to create a logical thinking game on mobile phone
and our personal constraint was "You are the enemy".
